english.segment1: seen it all. heard the talk. heart unturned. watch you leaving
english.segment2: some things have to fall on you. some things have to fall on you
english.segment3: i lift you up. pray for grace. love you more. still you run away. and Â…
english.segment4: what makes a man aware of his need. is it by faith, by words or by deed. for your heart to be broken, to truly be sent home. some things have to fall on you
english.segment5: spirit saves. letter kills. plant the seed. i'll be waiting
english.segment6: some things have to fall on you. spirit has to fall. it's true.
